title: kaNNArak-kANum
sahitya:
kaNNArak-kANum ihamE arivAna kaDavuLin aruLaghamE manamE


anupallavi

  eNNilA uyirellAm Eka caitanyak-kOvai iravi matiyadan iru vizhip-pArvaiyAm


caraNam     bhU uyirkkanbillAp-pUjaiyum palikkumO bhUta sharIram inri nAdAtmA kaLikkumO
pAvaik-kUttarasanum paTTam vaghippAnO parivum paNiyumillp-paribAgi sukhippAnO
